title: Basket
description:
A basket, as used for storing or carrying such things as food or clothes. Appearance widely varies across platforms but generally depicted as woven from wicker with one or more handles. Commonly used to represent doing laundry or having a picnic.

Apple and WhatsApp’s designs, featuring a white cloth, suggest a bread or picnic basket. Samsung’s design displays green fabric, as knitted from yarn.

Microsoft’s design previously suggested a laundry basket by holding a blue garment or cloth.

Not to be confused with üóëÔ∏è Wastebasket.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's basket emoji is depicted as a sturdy, woven container with a warm, natural brown hue, featuring intricate texture and subtle shadows that highlight its three-dimensional form. The smooth gradients and realistic lighting on Apple devices lend it a tactile quality, suggesting abundance and readiness for filling. This emoji often symbolizes shopping, picnics, gift-giving, or a collection of items, bringing a sense of organization and bounty to digital messages.
